description:
** One of the most comprehensive WordPress courses you will ever take**

LATEST: Course updated on Feb 15 2016 with 4 brand new videos.

Ever wanted to learn how to build a website with WordPress? Have you ever wanted to learn the skills required to manage your website on your own without having to hire expensive web developers to do so?

No prior experience of any sort of programming is required to take this course. I assume that you are a complete beginner and as such the lectures are delivered in a slow pace that is easy to follow without getting confused.

Once we have installed WordPress which we shall cover in the first section, the real fun begins because i am going to show you how to add content to your website. We shall work with text, images plus i will also show you how to embed videos from YouTube and maps from Google as well.

Next, we are going to work with a variety of plugins that will enhance your WordPress website. Infact, by the end of this particular section, you would have become an expert at working with plugins. We will then move on to cover the basics of WordPress SEO as well as security so that you will learn how to get your website ranked high on Google as well as how to protect your website from hackers.

We will also build a fully functional website using the WordPress 2012 theme.

Finally, i shall teach you some advanced techniques in WordPress such as how to transfer content from one WordPress site to another.

With all the other WordPress courses out there on the internet, you might be wondering why you should take my course. Well i will give you the following reasons:

  • I have been building websites with WordPress for the last 5 years and have also spent the last 3 years teaching my clients how to use it. In other words, I am an expert WordPress developer who knows his stuff.
  • By the end of the course, you would have learned how to use over 15 different awesome plugins that will add a lot of improved functionality to your website.
  • You will learn the basics of WordPress SEO to improve traffic to your website and the basics of WordPress security to protect your website from hackers and cyber criminals.
  • This course comes with money back guarantee for 30 days. If you are not happy with the course, simply ask me for a refund and i will return your money to you. No hard feelings whatsoever. You basically have nothing to lose by signing up today.

Best of luck and start learning how to build your own website today.

Don't procrastinate, start now.
title: WordPress for Beginners - Build Your First WordPress Website
